verses.verse: (Praise for Godâ€™s Surpassing Greatness) (Ps 19.1; 102.19) Praise the LORD! Praise God in his sanctuary; praise him in his mighty firmament! (Or dome)
(Deut 3.24; Ps 145.5, 6) Praise him for his mighty deeds; praise him according to his surpassing greatness!
(Ps 149.3) Praise him with trumpet sound; praise him with lute and harp!
(Ex 15.20; Isa 38.20) Praise him with tambourine and dance; praise him with strings and pipe!
(1 Chr 13.8; 15.16) Praise him with clanging cymbals; praise him with loud clashing cymbals!
Let everything that breathes praise the LORD! Praise the LORD!
